name: Smells Like A Mushroom: 100% Vegan Edition
storyline:
The Milky Way has been infected by Magic Mushrooms, and only vegetables can defeat them!

Take the role of the brave Carrotado in this third-person sci-fi shooter with a bizarre story for a single-player and co-op mode.

Parasitic mushrooms invaded from space, spreading all over the Milky Way. Since humans are long extinct and vegetables rule the Earth, this should no longer be a problem for you… But surprise! It is you who must stop the invasion.

Join the Aveggers aboard their space cruiser Soil-Trek and travel to planets throughout our solar system to defeat the head mushroom honcho, Satanus Boletus.

It’s not going to be easy, but as brave Carrotado, joined by General Despotato, scientists Nicola Siesta and Garlic Ailstein, you might just be able to do it.
summary:
Includes super-cool neon effect cover, awesome sticker sheet, stunning boss guide

Features
CHILL OUT AND LAUGH WITH THE MAGIC MUSHROOMS
The fun is provided by hilarious dialogues and a plot filled with symbols of "human" pop culture.

STOP THE MUSHACRE!
Take on the role of the carrot commando to liberate every planet in the solar system.

Use a variety of weapons to defeat different enemies and customise your appearance - will the vegetables succeed?

PLAY ALONE OR BRING A FRIEND
Enjoy the single-player mode with a bizarre storyline or join forces with a friend in split-screen co-op for two players.

EXPLORE SPACE WORLDS
Vast interstellar maps with a beautiful galactic art style accompanied by retro electro music.
